segments.text: I would like to take my vacation next month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to take my two weeks vacation time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Seeing as next month is our slow season , that should not be a problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I will make my reservations as necessary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just make sure to turn in all the necessary paperwork to ensure there are no problems with the days you want to take off .
segments.speaker: S2
